Conceptualization, M.Z.H. and S.C.; Methodology, M.Z.H. and L.X.; Software, M.Z.H.;
Validation, M.Z.H., S.C. and L.X., Formal Analysis, M.Z.H.; Investigation, M.Z.H.; Data Curation, M.Z.H. and I.I.;
Writing – Original Draft Preparation, M.Z.H.; Writing—Review & Editing, M.Z.H., S.C., L.X., I.I., J.T., and S.D.;
Visualization, M.Z.H. and I.I.; Supervision, S.C.; Project Administration, S.C. and L.X.; Funding Acquisition, S.C.
This study was jointly supported by The National Key Research and Development Programof China
(2017YFC0506603), Bureau of International Co-operation Chinese Academy of Sciences (132C35KYSB20150005),
National Natural Science Foundation of China (41661144032), and Chinese Academy of Sciences-The World
TWAS) President’s Fellowship Programfor international Ph.D. students at University
of Chinese Academy of Sciences (UCAS), China.
Authors extend their sincere gratitude to the experts and employees of di
in Bangladesh who spared us their valuable time during AHP and key informants’ interview. Bangladesh Bureau
of Statistics (BBS) is acknowledged to make the population census data available online. We also extend earnest
gratitude to the editor and anonymous reviewers for their productive comments and valued suggestions.
The authors declare no conﬂict of interest.
